name: ATHEMOS
description:
ATHEMOS is an educational game to help young adolescents with ADHD improve their organization, assignment tracking, and note-taking skills. Research described in this video trailer was supported by the Institute of Education Sciences, U.S. Department of Education, through grant R324A180219 to East Carolina University and Ohio University. The opinions expressed are those of the principal investigators and do not represent the views of the Institute or the U.S. Department of Education. 

For additional support materials, please visit our site at www.athemosthegame.org
